CONCLUSION: Violation of Article 3 - Prohibition of torture (Article 3 - Degrading treatment) (Substantive aspect);Violation of Article 14+8 - Prohibition of discrimination (Article 14 - Discrimination) (Article 8 - Right to respect for private and family life;Article 8-1 - Respect for family life)

CARDINAL . On DATE and DATE the applicant requested to be allowed conjugal visits from his wife . His requests were refused by the prison authorities , with the reasoning that no right to such visits was provided for prisoners in pre - trial detention .

QUANTITY the applicant , being a prisoner on remand , did not have the right to conjugal visits .
